message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. To ensure we find the right buyer who appreciates its true worth, we are initially offering it at an exclusive price of $1500000. Please let us know if this aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Hello Alice, Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the initial asking price. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1200000? I believe this might bring us closer to reaching an agreement.
